Title: Creates a tax deduction for certain expenses of health care professionals and emergency medical technicians relating to the COVID-19 declared emergency
Summary: Creates a tax deduction up to five thousand dollars for transportation and personal protective equipment expenses of health care professionals and emergency medical technicians relating to the COVID-19 declared emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a personal income tax deduction for unreimbursed transportation or personal protective equipment expenses for health care professionals and emergency medical technicians related to the COVID-19 declared emergency
